Dislaimer

This project was created as part of my bachelor thesis at HAW Hamburg during the winter semester 2024/25. It is intended solely for educational purposes and serves as a conceptual example for the topic of accessibility in digital systems. No claim is made to the completeness or absolute accuracy of the information provided. The content and implementations shown are based on the state of research at the time of creation. Changes and developments in the field of digital accessibility may render parts of the project outdated or incomplete. The rights to any resources used, such as fonts, icons, or illustrations, remain with their respective creators. Should any content unintentionally infringe on third-party rights, please inform me so that it can be removed or replaced promptly.

Contact Information

If you have any questions, feedback, or suggestions, please feel free to contact me at: feuring.tim@gmail.com

Used Resources

The project utilizes publicly available Google Fonts and assets from the Google Material 3 Design Library. All rights to these resources remain with their respective creators. Should any content unintentionally infringe on third-party rights, please notify me so that it can be addressed promptly.
